_header: The bakers boy is very cranky
_description: ‘My good boy’: a nonsense poem, possibly erotic — thirteen quatrains (aaab)

DULCosVii13.Transcription:
He bakarse boy is vere CraynkeCom hether Gessere Spendell
                    ShaynkeA myserse hand wast never franketo ane…vppon soch a
                    waggan dore not bettMy Good Boye
